scripts.fix:paths: if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "darwin"* ]]; then sed -i '' 's|href="/|href="./|g' src/assets/external-apps/vue-app/index.html && sed -i '' 's|src="/|src="./|g' src/assets/external-apps/vue-app/index.html && sed -i '' 's|href="/|href="./|g' src/assets/external-apps/react-app/index.html && sed -i '' 's|src="/|src="./|g' src/assets/external-apps/react-app/index.html; else sed -i 's|href="/|href="./|g' src/assets/external-apps/vue-app/index.html && sed -i 's|src="/|src="./|g' src/assets/external-apps/vue-app/index.html && sed -i 's|href="/|href="./|g' src/assets/external-apps/react-app/index.html && sed -i 's|src="/|src="./|g' src/assets/external-apps/react-app/index.html; fi
scripts.setup:apps: mkdir -p src/assets/external-apps/vue-app src/assets/external-apps/react-app && npm run copy:vue && npm run copy:react && npm run fix:paths
scripts.serve:all: npm run build:all && npx http-server dist/angular-courses-portal -p 4200
